EnumProperty.Name: CLRSupport
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies whether this configuration supports the .NET or the .NET Framework Runtime. This is incompatible with some other settings, e.g. runtime checks. See help for /clr family of C++ compiler switches for full list of conflicts.

StringProperty.Name: TargetFrameworkVersion
StringProperty.Description: Version of the .NET Framework that is targeted by the project. This only applies if '.NET Framework Runtime Support' is set.

StringProperty.Name: TargetFramework
StringProperty.Description: Version of the .NET that is targeted by the project. This only applies if 'Common Language Runtime Support' is set to '.NET Runtime Support'.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableManagedIncrementalBuild
BoolProperty.Description: Enables managed incremental build scenarios using metagen.

BoolProperty.Name: ManagedAssembly
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable CLR Support for Individual Files
BoolProperty.Description: Enables building only some files in the project as managed.

StringProperty.Name: TargetExt
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file extension that the program will have. (Example: .exe or .dll)

StringListProperty.Name: ExtensionsToDeleteOnClean
StringListProperty.Description: Semi-colon delimited wildcard specification for which files in the intermediate directory to delete on clean or rebuild.

StringProperty.Name: BuildLogFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the build log file to write to when build logging is enabled.

EnumProperty.Name: PreferredToolArchitecture
EnumProperty.Description: Determines which build tools will be used to compile programs (32-bit or 64-bit).

BoolProperty.Name: UseDebugLibraries
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether the configuration is set up for development or for production.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableUnitySupport
BoolProperty.Description: Enables a build process where many C++ source files are combined into one or more 'unity' files before compilation to improve build performance. Unrelated to the Unity game engine.

BoolProperty.Name: CopyLocalDeploymentContent
BoolProperty.Description: Copy items that are marked as content to this project's output directory.

BoolProperty.Name: CopyLocalProjectReference
BoolProperty.Description: Copy project references' output (dll/exe) to this project's output directory. In C++/CLI (/clr) projects, this property is ignored and referenced output copying is controlled by the Copy Local property of the reference.

BoolProperty.Name: CopyLocalDebugSymbols
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Copy Project References' Symbols to OutDir
BoolProperty.Description: Copy project references' symbols (pdb) to this project's output directory along side to the project references' output (dll/exe). Always enabled for CLR Projects.

BoolProperty.Name: CopyCppRuntimeToOutputDir
BoolProperty.Description: Copy C++ runtime dlls to this project's output directory.

EnumProperty.Name: UseOfMfc
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies how MFC is used by the configuration.

EnumValue.Name: Static
EnumValue.DisplayName: Use MFC in a Static Library
EnumValue.Description: Use MFC in a Static Library

EnumValue.Name: Dynamic
EnumValue.DisplayName: Use MFC in a Shared DLL
EnumValue.Description: Use MFC in a Shared DLL

EnumProperty.Name: CharacterSet
EnumProperty.Description: Tells the compiler to use the specified character set; aids in localization issues.

EnumProperty.Name: WholeProgramOptimization
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies that the program will be optimized across .obj boundaries; works best if C/C++ optimizations are turned on.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: VCToolsVersion
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the full version of the MSVC toolset that this project will use for builds.

BoolProperty.Name: UseStructuredOutput
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the build to use structured (SARIF) output from the compiler for better diagnostics.
